Package org.radarbase.auth.token

Class AbstractRadarToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarbase.auth.token.AbstractRadarToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RadarToken
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JwtRadarToken
    public abstract class AbstractRadarToken
extends java.lang.Object
implements RadarToken
    Partial implementation of RadarToken, providing a default implementation for the three permission checks.

    • Method Detail

      • hasAuthority

        public boolean hasAuthority​(java.lang.String authority)
        Description copied from interface: RadarToken
        Check if this token gives the given permission, not taking into account project affiliations.

        This token must have the authority in its set of authorities. If it's a client credentials token, this is the only requirement, as a client credentials token is linked to an OAuth client and not to a user in the system.

        Specified by:
        hasAuthority in interface RadarToken
        Parameters:
        authority - The permission to check
        Returns:
        true if this token has the permission, false otherwise

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission​(Permission permission)
        Description copied from interface: RadarToken
        Check if this token gives the given permission, not taking into account project affiliations.

        This token must have the permission in its set of scopes. If it's a client credentials token, this is the only requirement, as a client credentials token is linked to an OAuth client and not to a user in the system. If it's not a client credentials token, this also checks to see if the user has a role with the specified permission.

        Specified by:
        hasPermission in interface RadarToken
        Parameters:
        permission - The permission to check
        Returns:
        true if this token has the permission, false otherwise

      • hasPermissionOnProject

        Description copied from interface: RadarToken
        Check if this token gives a permission in a specific project.
        Specified by:
        hasPermissionOnProject in interface RadarToken
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission
        projectName - the project name
        Returns:
        true if this token has the permission in the project, false otherwise

      • isClientCredentials

        public boolean isClientCredentials()
        Description copied from interface: RadarToken
        Whether the current credentials were obtained with a OAuth 2.0 client credentials flow.
        Specified by:
        isClientCredentials in interface RadarToken
        Returns:
        true if the client credentials flow was certainly used, false otherwise.

      • hasAuthorityForPermission

        protected boolean hasAuthorityForPermission​(Permission permission)
        Check all authorities in this token, project and non-project specific, for the given permission.
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission
        Returns:
        true if any authority contains the permission, false otherwise

      • hasAuthorityForProject

        protected boolean hasAuthorityForProject​(Permission permission,
                                         java.lang.String projectName)
        Check authorities in this token linked to the given project, or not linked to any project (such as SYS_ADMIN), for the given permission.
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission
        projectName - the project name
        Returns:
        true if any authority contains the permission, false otherwise

      • hasAuthorityForSubject

        protected boolean hasAuthorityForSubject​(Permission permission,
                                         java.lang.String projectName,
                                         java.lang.String subjectName)
        Check authorities in this token linked to the given project, or not linked to any project (such as SYS_ADMIN), for the given permission on the given subject.
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission
        projectName - the project name
        subjectName - the subject name
        Returns:
        true if any authority contains the permission, false otherwise

      • hasNonProjectRelatedAuthorityForPermission

        protected boolean hasNonProjectRelatedAuthorityForPermission​(Permission permission)
        Check if any non-project related authority has the given permission. Currently the only non-project authority is SYS_ADMIN, so we only check for that.
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission
        Returns:
        true if any non-project related authority has the permission, false otherwise

      • isJustParticipant

        protected boolean isJustParticipant​(java.lang.String projectName)
        Check if this token only has the participant role in the given project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - the project
        Returns:
        true if this token only has the participant role in the given project, false otherwise
